item.title: The Builders and the Butchers - Bringin Home the Rain
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gzDqCcTeSmY song : Bringin’ Home the Rain artist : The Builders and the Butchers album :The Builders and the Butchers lyrics: Blood-shot, your eyes drop, And the skin’s all wearin’ thin. There’s no one here to tell you ‘bout the depth of the water, Or the trouble that you’re in. You’re dancin’ with your demons, baby, You forgot your former life. And it was hard swimmin’ once And now you’re daily divin’ in.
